column4: hey, in windows i can change my IP using netsh changing my address to 192.168.1.105 and mask to 255.255.255.0 then I use "netsh interface ip set address name="network" source=dhcp"  after that I do a /renew and i have new IP... is there a way to do it in ubuntu ?
ya, change it... my IP is static for few days then it changes, but i can do it manually in windows using that
so i want to do it manually in linux :p
